localizedDescriptions.en: Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.
The subjective clinical history of the subject of care as recorded directly by the subject, or reported to a clinician by the subject or a carer.
Local archetype to capture specific questions asked in Salford COPD self-reporting project.

children.name: Feeling today or since last reading
children.localizedName: Feeling today or since last reading

localizedNames.en: Feeling today or since last reading

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient-reported statement about how they are feeling today or since last reading.

annotations.comment: Exact question: 'How are you feeling today or since your last reading?'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they are feeling as well as usual today or since last reading.
Patient reports that they are feeling better than usual today or since last reading.
Patient reports that they are feeling worse than usual today or since last reading.

children.name: Breathing today or since last reading
children.localizedName: Breathing today or since last reading

localizedNames.en: Breathing today or since last reading

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reported statement about how they are breathing today or since last reading.

annotations.comment: Exact question: 'How are you breathing today or since your last reading?'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they are breathing normal for them today or since last reading.
Patient reports that they are breathing worse than normal for them today or since last reading.

list.label: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedLabels.en: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they are breathing much worse than normal for them today or since last reading.
Patient-reported statement whether they are using oxygen.
Patient reports that they are using oxygen.
Patient reports that they are using continuous oxygen.
Patient reports that they are not using oxygen.
Patient reported statement whether oxygen saturation reading was taken on oxygen.
Patient reports that oxygen saturation reading was taken on oxygen.
Patient reports that oxygen saturation reading was not taken on oxygen.

children.name: Shortness of breath since last reading
children.localizedName: Shortness of breath since last reading

localizedNames.en: Shortness of breath since last reading

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient-reported statement whether they have been experiencing shortness of breath since last reading.

annotations.comment: Exact question: 'Since your last reading, have you been experiencing shortness of breath?'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that experiencing shortness of breath has been the same as last reading.
Patient reports that experiencing shortness of breath has been worse than last reading.
Patient reports that experiencing shortness of breath has been much worse than last reading.
Patien-reported statement whether since their last reading, they have woken in the night with breathing difficulties.

annotations.comment: Exact question: 'Since your last reading, did you wake in the night with breathing difficulties?'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they did not wake in the night with breathing difficulties since last reading.
Patient reports that they did wake in the night with breathing difficulties since last reading, but this was normal for them.

list.label: Waking worse than normal for patient

localizedLabels.en: Waking worse than normal for patient

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they did wake in the night with breathing difficulties since last reading, and that this was worse than normal for them.
Patient reports that they can't sleep due to breathing since their last reading.
Patient-reported statement whether they are coughing.
Patient reports that they are coughing.
Patient reports that they are not coughing.
Patient reported statement about whether cough is normal, worse or much worse than normal for them.
Patient reports that cough is normal for them.
Patient reports that cough is worse than normal for them.

list.label: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedLabels.en: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that cough is much worse than normal for them.
Patient-reported statement whether they are producing sputum.
Patient reports that they are producing sputum normal for them.
Patient reports that they are producing sputum worse than normal for them.

list.label: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedLabels.en: Much worse than normal for patient

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they are producing sputum much worse than normal for them.
Patient-reported statement about the colour of their sputum.

annotations.comment: Exact question: 'Is the colour of your sputum:'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that the colour of their sputum is clear or white.
Patient reports that the colour of their sputum is yellow.
Patient reports that the colour of their sputum is green or brown.
Patient-reported statement whether they have taken their medication.

annotations.comment: Exaxct question: 'Have you taken your medication including inhalers/nebulisers?'

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that they have taken their medication.
Patient reports that they have not taken their medication.
Patient-reported statement whether their ankles are swollen.
Patient reports that their ankles are not swollen.

list.label: Moderate but not worse than last reading

localizedLabels.en: Moderate but not worse than last reading

localizedDescriptions.en: Patient reports that their ankles are moderately swollen but not worse than last reading.
Patient reports that their ankles are swollen and getting worse.
Blood oxygen and related measurements, measured by pulse oximetry or pulse CO-oximetry.
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
The saturation of oxygen in the peripheral blood, measured via pulse oximetry.

annotations.comment: SpO is defined as the percentage of oxyhaemoglobin (HbO) to the total concentration of haemoglobin (HbO + deoxyhaemoglobin) in peripheral blood.

localizedDescriptions.en: A text comment about the pulse oximetry result.
Record details about the rate and associated attributes for a pulse or heart beat.
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
The heart rate, measured in beats per minute.

annotations.comment: Run-time name constraints have been specified, in order to simplify the renaming of this data element to Pulse Rate or Heart Rate, as required.

localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the pulse or heart beat findings not captured in other fields.
A measurement of the body temperature, which is a surrogate for the core body temperature of the individual.
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
The measured body temperature (as a surrogate for the core of the body).
Additional comment about the body temperature measurement not captured in other fields.
